itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Liquid IV founder Brandin Cohen to talk about the history of the company — how he got the idea for it, who the initial investors were, and how long it took him to make money — plus Brandin talks about celebri...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Liquid IV founder Brandin Cohen to talk about the history of the company — how he got the idea for it, who the initial investors were, and how long it took him to make money — plus Brandin talks about celebrity collaborations with Liquid IV, Dan shares a ridiculous combat story, and Ross and Dan break down a video of a bobcat attacking a lady.
